import React from'react';import{CChartLine}from'@coreui/react-chartjs';import{getStyle,hexToRgba}from'@coreui/utils';var brandSuccess=getStyle('success')||'#4dbd74';var brandInfo=getStyle('info')||'#20a8d8';var brandDanger=getStyle('danger')||'#f86c6b';var MainChartExample=function MainChartExample(attributes){var random=function random(min,max){return Math.floor(Math.random()*(max-min+1)+min);};var defaultDatasets=function(){var elements=27;var data1=[];var data2=[];var data3=[];for(var i=0;i<=elements;i++){data1.push(random(50,200));data2.push(random(80,100));data3.push(65);}return[{label:'My First dataset',backgroundColor:hexToRgba(brandInfo,10),borderColor:brandInfo,pointHoverBackgroundColor:brandInfo,borderWidth:2,data:data1},{label:'My Second dataset',backgroundColor:'transparent',borderColor:brandSuccess,pointHoverBackgroundColor:brandSuccess,borderWidth:2,data:data2},{label:'My Third dataset',backgroundColor:'transparent',borderColor:brandDanger,pointHoverBackgroundColor:brandDanger,borderWidth:1,borderDash:[8,5],data:data3}];}();var defaultOptions=function(){return{maintainAspectRatio:false,legend:{display:false},scales:{xAxes:[{gridLines:{drawOnChartArea:false}}],yAxes:[{ticks:{beginAtZero:true,maxTicksLimit:5,stepSize:Math.ceil(250/5),max:250},gridLines:{display:true}}]},elements:{point:{radius:0,hitRadius:10,hoverRadius:4,hoverBorderWidth:3}}};}();// render
return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CChartLine,Object.assign({},attributes,{datasets:defaultDatasets,options:defaultOptions,labels:['Mo','Tu','We','Th','Fr','Sa','Su','Mo','Tu','We','Th','Fr','Sa','Su','Mo','Tu','We','Th','Fr','Sa','Su','Mo','Tu','We','Th','Fr','Sa','Su']}));};export default MainChartExample;
